entry.title: kwappa/emacs-config
entry.summary:
emacs-config

Emacs configurations with package management using el-get.

This repository was creted in reference to typester/emacs-config.

install and start up

% git clone git://github.com/kwappa/emacs-config.git

# in terminal
% emacs -q -l emacs-config/init.el

# Cocoa Emacs
% /Applications/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs -q -l emacs-config/init.el

Links

  • Emacsの設定を見直し、 el-get の distributed セットアップに統一 - unknownplace.org
  • typester/emacs-config · GitHub
  • dimitri/el-get · GitHub
